feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files and their roles in the Valentine experience.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining design tokens and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the animated background and main Valentine experience.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedDreamyBa: Creates animated gradient background with floating particles.
frontend/src/components/ApologyLetter.ts: Displays Akash’s styled apology letter with centered layout and fade‑in animation.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationDecor: Renders and auto‑cleans floating celebration emoji decorations.
frontend/src/components/RomanticPhotoMod: Shows a modal with a couple photo and animated backdrop with close control.
frontend/src/components/TopCenterPopup.t: Auto‑dismissing top‑center toast for No‑button popup messages.
frontend/src/components/ValentineApology: Main flow component managing Yes/No logic, popups, modal, audio, and celebrations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCelebrationSpawner: Periodically spawns decorative emoji objects with randomized properties and cleans up its interval on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Computes and updates random safe positions for a moving 'No' button, adjusting on resize and exposing style and ref.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client setup, login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useNoClickPopups.ts: Manages a sequence of timed popup messages for No button clicks, ensuring single-popup visibility with auto-dismiss.
frontend/src/hooks/useYesClickAudio.ts: Initializes and plays an audio file on user gesture, handling autoplay errors silently.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom Valentine-themed variables, animations, and UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, fonts, and plugins matching the app's theme.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, visual/UX requirements, button behaviors, and architectural notes for building an interactive Valentine-themed apology site. Lists existing features, design rules, and viewport-safe logic for the evasive button and decorative effects.
